Posts.Content: Had 28 IGRT external radiation treatments and Brachytherapy back in January 2012. PSA seems to keep climbing. Uro Dr. says no cause for concern talking about "PSA Bounce". Pre radiation and seeding psa-3.9 May 2012-2.7 Aug 2012-3.2 Nov 2012-6.2 Any thoughts from anybody? Should I be worried?
Posts.Signature: 45 years old PSA 3.9 12 needle biopsy 3 cores positive 30% 40% 50%(PNI present) (3+3)G6 Stage T1C Treatment choice: IGRT & Brachytherapy
Posts.Title: PSA Bounce after combination IGRT/Brachytherapy
